title: Tigris eSports is doing open tryouts for every position (d2+)
body:
Tigris eSports is doing open tryouts for every position (d2+)

What can we offer you?
- paid position
- long term contract
- Professional management and Coaching
- High goals and a good work environment to reach this goals

What we expect from you:
- Fluent GERMAN 
- Minimum rank: Diamond 2
- Active playing and training
- At least 16 years old
- Willingness to commit both socially and gameplay wise

If you have any questions, add me
